name: Referential
description: The fastest API to access countries, states, cities, continents, dial and zip codes in up to 20 languages. A collection of data APIs to support forms, signups, search and lookup. Our endpoints are optimized for speed and size. Our data is regularly maintained and comes from International Standardization bodies, the United Nations, government surveys and GIS datasets. We do not scrape WikiPedia etc

api_methods.name: City by IP address (Geo IP)
api_methods.description: Find a city, state, country and continent by IP address. For some results, the closest result within 10 miles will be provided.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: ip4 pr ip6 formatted IP address

constraints.format: ip4 or ip6 formatted IP address

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [geonameid, timezone,state_code,iso_a2]

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the city and country for the IP address 192.168.1.1?
I need the timezone and state code for the IP 203.0.113.5.
What is the geoname ID for the IP address 172.16.254.1?
Find the ISO country code for the IP 10.0.0.1.
Could you provide the state code and geoname ID for the IP 198.51.100.14?
Get me the timezone for the IP address 203.0.113.195.
What is the city and its geoname ID for the IP 192.0.2.44?
I want to know the state code and ISO country code for the IP 198.51.100.22.
Can you find the timezone and ISO country code for the IP 203.0.113.10?
Please provide the geoname ID and timezone for the IP address 192.0.2.33.

api_methods.name: Countries
api_methods.description: List or search countries of the world in different languages.. Get iso a2, a3 country code and localized country name

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Filter on currency name in chosen lang

parameters.name: dial_code
parameters.description: Filter on country dial code

parameters.name: currency_code
parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter currency code (ISO)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return for each country [iso_a2, iso_a3, continent_code, dial_code, currency_code, currency_num_code, currency]

parameters.name: iso_a2
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter iso country code

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Country name search string. Can be partial contains...

parameters.name: continent_code
parameters.description: Two letter region/continent code (eu, na, sa, as, af, oc, an). Lookup at /v1/continent.

parameters.name: iso_a3
parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter iso country code

parameters.name: currency_num_code
parameters.description: Filter on 3 digit numeric currency code (ISO)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

utterances.utterance: Can you list all countries in Europe with their ISO alpha-2 codes?
Show me countries that use the currency code USD.
Find countries with the dial code 91.
List countries in South America with their ISO alpha-3 codes.
What countries have the currency number code 978?
Give me a list of countries with the name starting with 'Can'.
Show me the countries with the ISO alpha-2 code 'FR'.
List all countries in Asia with their continent codes.
Can you provide a list of countries with the currency name 'Euro'?
Find countries with the ISO alpha-3 code 'AUS'.

api_methods.name: Cities
api_methods.description: List and search over 75,000 world cities in 20 languages.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to N results

parameters.name: state_hasc
parameters.description: Filter on state's HASC code. List at /v1/state.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Filter on timezone name. List at /v1/timezone.

parameters.name: geonameid
parameters.description: Filter on geonameid

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Search by names starting with prefix. See also limit, order and sort fields.

parameters.name: timezone_offset
parameters.description: Filter on timezone offset in hours

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort on field [population, state_code, name, timezone, state_hasc, iso_a2]. Please see limit and order fields.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

parameters.name: iso_a2
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search as \"contains\" on city name in chosen lang

parameters.name: state_code
parameters.description: Filter on state's ISO-3166-2 letter code. List at /v1/state

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2,state_code,timezone,timezone_offset,state_hasc,geonameid]

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order [asc | desc]

utterances.utterance: Can you list cities in the US with a population sort order?
Show me cities in California with a timezone offset of -8 hours.
Find cities starting with 'San' in Spanish.
List cities in the GMT timezone, sorted by name.
What are the cities in France with a limit of 10 results?
Give me cities in the state with HASC code 'US.TX'.
List cities containing 'York' in their name, sorted by state code.
Show cities in Germany with fields for timezone and geonameid.
Find cities in Japan with a descending order by timezone.
Can you list cities in the UK with a timezone offset of 0?

api_methods.name: State
api_methods.description: List the sub-regions/states/provinces/departments of the world's countries

parameters.name: iso_a2
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

parameters.name: iso_3166_2
parameters.description: Filter on Subregion's ISO-3166-2 letter code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to select in the result [iso_a2]

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter as \"contains\" on the states's name in chosen lang

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the states in the United States?
Show me the provinces of Canada, but only the first 10.
I need the states in Brazil with their ISO codes.
List the regions in Germany in German language.
What are the states in India that contain 'Pradesh' in their name?
Could you provide the subregions of Australia with a limit of 5?
Find the departments in France using the ISO code FR-75.
List the states in Mexico in Spanish.
Can you show me the states in Nigeria with their names and ISO codes?
I want to see the regions in Italy, but only the first 15.

api_methods.name: Timezones
api_methods.description: List the world's time zones in 20 languages

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Filter on non daylights savings offset in hours

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter as "contains" on timezone name in chosen lang

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter non daylight savings timezone code (not unique)

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Filter on timezone name in english

parameters.name: daylights_offset
parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings offset in hours

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

parameters.name: daylights_code
parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings letter code (not unique)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [code,timezone,daylights_code,daylights_offset,daylights,hours_offset,offset]

parameters.name: daylights
parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings/non daylight savings timezones (true,false)

utterances.utterance: Can you list the time zones with a non-daylight savings offset of 3 hours?
Show me the time zones that include 'Pacific' in their name.
I need the time zones with the code 'EST'.
What are the time zones in English that have a daylight savings offset of 2 hours?
List the time zones with the daylight savings code 'DST'.
Could you provide the time zones with a non-daylight savings offset of -5 hours in French?
Find time zones that are currently observing daylight savings time.
Give me the time zones with the name 'Eastern Standard Time'.
Can you show the time zones with fields limited to code and timezone?
List the time zones that are not observing daylight savings time.

api_methods.name: City by id
api_methods.description: Direct lookup of over 75,000 cities by id. See the v1/city API to search for city ids.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Lookup at /v1/city.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2,state_code,timezone,timezone_offset,state_hasc]

utterances.utterance: Can you provide details about the city with ID DULUTH|US-GA?
I need information about the city identified as PARIS|FR in French.
Give me the timezone and state code for the city with ID TOKYO|JP.
What are the details of the city with ID SYDNEY|AU in Spanish?
Fetch the state HASC and timezone offset for the city with ID LONDON|GB.
Can you tell me the ISO code and timezone for the city with ID BERLIN|DE?
I want to know the state code and timezone offset for the city with ID ROME|IT.
Please provide the city details for ID CAIRO|EG in Arabic.
What is the timezone and state HASC for the city with ID MUMBAI|IN?
Can you give me the state code and ISO code for the city with ID BEIJING|CN?

api_methods.name: Country by iso code
api_methods.description: Get country by 2 letter iso code localized to a given language

parameters.name: iso_code
parameters.description: 2 letter iso country code.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma deliminated list of fields to return in response

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: 2 letter iso language code to localize country name

I'd like to know about the country with ISO code 'JP' in Japanese.

I need the country details for ISO code 'CN' in Chinese.

Please provide the country information for ISO code 'AU' in English.
What is the country with ISO code 'ES' and its main exports?
Can you show me the country details for ISO code 'RU' in Russian?

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 state/province/deparm

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2]

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Two letter iso continent code. Lookup /v1/continent.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Two letter iso 639-2 language code (i.e. en, sv, pl etc). Lookup /v1/lang.

parameters.name: continent_code
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter continent code

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter on continent name (value field) as \"contains\"

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return for each continent [iso_a2, iso_a3, continent_code, dial_code, currency_code, currency_num_code, currency]

api_methods.name: Continents
api_methods.description: List continents of the world localized to requested language

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return for each continent [iso_a2, iso_a3, continent_code, dial_code, currency_code, currency_num_code, currency]

parameters.name: continent_code
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter continent code

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Two letter iso 639-2 language code (i.e. en, sv, pl etc). Lookup /v1/lang.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter as "contains" on continent name in chosen lang

api_methods.name: Languages
api_methods.description: List the world's languages translated into 20 languages

parameters.name: lang_3
parameters.description: Filter by 3 letter ISO language code

parameters.name: iso_a2
parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [flag,iso_a2,lang_3,lang]

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns a language translated into lang language

api_methods.name: Language by id

parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [flag,iso_a2,lang_3,lang]

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Timezone

parameters.name: fields

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en
